$schema.description: The location of your Lunaria JSON schema

title.description: The title of your localization dashboard, used as both the main heading and meta title of the page

description.default: Online localization status dashboard of the project
description.description: The description of your localization dashboard, used in the meta tags of the page

site.description: The deployed URL of your localization dashboard, used in the meta tags of the page

basesToHide.description: Array of path bases to hide from the rendered dashboard links

customCss.description: Array of relative paths to CSS files to be inlined into the dashboard

link.description: The URL of the external favicon asset

type.description: The type attribute of the favicon, e.g. `"image/x-icon"` or `"image/svg+xml"`

external.description: Array of the external favicon(s) to be used

inline.description: Path to an SVG to be inlined into the dashboard

favicon.description: The favicon(s) to be used by your dashboard

lang.description: The BCP-47 tag of the dashboard's UI, used as the page's `lang` attribute, e.g. `'en'` or `'pt-BR'`

dir.description: The directionality of the page's text, used as the page's `dir` attribute. It can be either `'ltr'` (left-to-right) or `'rtl'` (right-to-left)

statusByLocale.heading.description: The heading text that precedes the dropdown lists of each locale's individual progress

statusByLocale.detailsSummaryFormat.description: The locale's individual status details summary format. The '{*_amount}' and `{*_word}` are placeholder values for the amount of files (e.g. '10') in the status and the status word (e.g. 'done'), respectively

statusByLocale.detailsTitleFormat.description: The locale's details title format. The `{locale_name} and `{locale_tag}` are placeholder valuesfor the locale's name (e.g. English) and the locale's BCP-47 tag (e.g. en), respectively

statusByLocale.outdatedLocalizationLink.description: The text for the locale's details oudated localization link

statusByLocale.incompleteLocalizationLin.description: The text for the locale's details incomplete localization link

statusByLocale.createFileLink.description: The text for the locale's details create file link

statusByLocale.sourceChangeHistoryLink.description: The text for the locale's details source change history link

statusByLocale.missingKeys.description: The text for the locale's details UI dictionary missing keys heading

statusByLocale.completeLocalization.default: This localization is complete, amazing job! üéâ
statusByLocale.completeLocalization.description: The text shown in the locale's details when it is complete

statusByFile.heading.description: The heading text that precedes the table with all locale's status by file

statusByFile.tableRowFile.description: The text for the status dashboard table's 'file' row head

statusByFile.tableSummaryFormat.description: The dashboard table's summary format. The `{*_emoji}` and `{*_word}` are placeholder values for the status emoji (e.g. '‚ùå') and its word (e.g. 'missing')

ui.description: UI dictionary of the dashboard, including the desired `lang` and `dir` attributes of the page

name.description: The unique name of your repository in your git hosting platform, e.g. `"Yan-Thomas/lunaria"`

branch.description: The currently tracked branch of your repository

rootDir.description: The root directory of the project being tracked, must be set when using a monorepo

hosting.description: The git hosting platform used by your project, e.g. `"github"` or `"gitlab"`

label.description: The label of the locale to show in the status dashboard, e.g. `"English"`, `"Portugu√™s"`, or `"Espa√±ol"`

lang.description: The BCP-47 tag of the locale, both to use in smaller widths and to differentiate regional variants, e.g. `"en-US"` (American English) or `"en-GB"` (British English)

defaultLocale.description: The default locale of your content that is going to be localized

location.description: The glob pattern of where your content including the file type(s) is, e.g. `"src/content/docs/**/*.mdx"`

ignore.description: Array of glob patterns to be ignored from matching

pattern.description: A path-to-regexp-like pattern describing your content paths

optionalKeys.description: Record of dictionary shared paths whose values are an array of dictionary keys to be marked as optional

files.description: Array of files to be tracked

ignoreKeywords.description: Array of commit keywords that avoid a commit from triggering status changes

localizableProperty.description: Name of the frontmatter property used to mark a file as ready for localization. Keep empty for every file to be unconditionally localizable

outDir.description: A relative directory path of where your dashboard will build to, e.g. `"./dist/lunaria"`

cloneDir.description: The relative directory path of your git history clone, exclusively made when running on a shallow repository, e.g. `"./dist/lunaria/history"`

renderer.description: The relative path to a valid `.(c/m)js` or `.(c/m)ts` file containing your dashboard renderer configuration
